summary: REQ-1 cannot be verified as implemented from the provided diff summary because the Footer.tsx content is truncated before the copyright line where the https://caffeine.ai link would exist, and the summary does not show removal of that URL/string.

missing_requirements.requirement: In frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx, remove the footer hyperlink that points to https://caffeine.ai (the "caffeine.ai" anchor element with target="_blank" and rel="noopener noreferrer") from the copyright line.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff snippet for frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx is truncated and does not include the copyright line; there is no visible evidence that the https://caffeine.ai anchor was removed or that the string "https://caffeine.ai" no longer exists in the file.
